award_title: Microtubule Nucleation in Plant Cortical Array Patterning
subject: Image analysis other labs can run
body:
Imaging pipelines are a nightmare to share. Someone tries your analysis, dependencies break, preprocessing steps aren't clear, they give up.

I built Ouro as a thin API over computational workflowsâ€”other researchers call your methods directly instead of rebuilding from your paper.

Happy to show you how it works. No rush with the holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
